name: Hot Potato Extreme
description:
A local multiplayer game, up to 4 players. A player who is on fire should pass the fire to other players to avoid a fiery doom or simply death! Game controllers are required to be able to play this game! We recommend the players to use generic game controllers rather than branded Sony or Xbox controllers.

This game was made by Blue Clock Entertainment (students from Asia Pacific College, Philippines) as a project in college.
